snippet: The families of victims filed a legal complaint to compel the government to reveal its lines of inquiry in the crash in October, for which an affiliate of the Islamic State claimed responsibility.
lead_paragraph: The families of victims filed a legal complaint to compel the government to reveal its lines of inquiry in the crash in October, for which an affiliate of the Islamic State claimed responsibility.

headline.main: Russian Families Seek Information on Plane Crash in Egypt

keywords.name: organizations
